channel.title: Dementhium [Need pro persons help]
channel.description:
When a player equips items he/she becomes invisible. I think this is a cache problem, how do I fix it?
Also, it takes a while for the client to load [lags at 1% and also at logging in - please wait] how do I fix these?
Will rep++

item.title: Dementhium [Need pro persons help]
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I have seen this issue before, it has to do with the graphics of the web-client and such, as for the lagging, find the class that calls the loading bar, and find what it does at 1%, then go to that method and see what it does, then you will find your issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Dementhium [Need pro persons help]
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

No this is on the Downloadable client [639 Deob]

item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

Ok. this is on webclient correct?
This happens to most people.
Ask fridder from fridderscape he can fix it… Does same thing to my webclient but my players can see fine…
